description: This file defines an interface 'BluetoothPlatform' that abstracts Bluetooth operations for an Android application. It includes properties for device status and scan results, and functions for managing Bluetooth device scanning and connections.

classes.name: BluetoothPlatform
classes.description: An interface providing Bluetooth operation methods for platform-specific implementations.

methods.name: stopScan
methods.description: Stops the ongoing Bluetooth device scan.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to a specified Bluetooth device.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects from the current Bluetooth device.

methods.name: reconnectLast
methods.description: Reconnects to the last connected device, if available.

methods.name: shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down Bluetooth operations and releases resources.
